portfolio.title: Khooshesanat Amol
portfolio.author: farham aghdasi
portfolio.accordionContent: HTML CSS JS PHP Gsap Jquery
portfolio.description:
Introduction

khooshesanat website is a powerful website with fullstack development that uses PHP for the backend and jQuery and GSAP for the frontend.


This website also contains dashboard pages to create content that makes a dedicated website and reception. This website is also optimized for SEO and speed and security is also provided to some extent. This project was done from zero to one hundred by Farham Aghdasi and was completed within 1 month.


All pages of this website are words and keywords in all products to have the best performance in this field. This website is a corporate site and will become a store website in the future.

It is also equipped with a logging system with the help of Telegram bots that shows the number of visitors who call.
